item.description: Khadijah Thabit (Copyeditor) Khadijah Thabit is an editor with over 3 years of experience editing and managing contents such as articles, blogs, newsletters and social leads. She has a BA in English and Literary Studies from the University of Ibadan, Nigeria. Khadijah joined Legit.ng in September 2020 as a copyeditor and proofreader for the Human Interest, Current Affairs, Business, Sports and PR desks. As a grammar police, she develops her skills by reading novels and dictionaries.

item.title: President Jonathan Receives New Video Showing Abducted Chibok Girls Pleading For Their Lives
item.description: A new report has emerged about the Chibok girls abducted in Borno state on April 14, that President Goodluck Jonathan received a video where the schoolgirls were seen pleading for him to spare their lives, according to UK Telegraph. The Boko Haram sects are said to have sent the video to the President by an  intermediary, a Nigerian Journalist, Ahmad Salika in a bid to change the mind of Jonathan concerning his rejection of the original deal to swap the school girls for Boko haram prisoners.

item.title: Robert Saleh - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Football coach who gained fame as the defensive coordinator for the San Francisco 49ers between 2017 and 2020. He led the teams top-ranked defense to Super Bowl LIV in 2020, where the team lost. Before Fame He played tight end for Northern Michigan University between 1998 and 2002. He graduated with a degree in finance. Trivia He accepted the head coaching job for the New York Jets during the 2021 offseason. He won Super Bowl XLVIII in 2014 as a defensive quality control coach with the Seattle Seahawks.

item.title: Video: Nnamdi Kanu's last words before arrest by DSS
item.description: A video has been obtained of Nnamdi Kanu's last words before his arrest by the Department of State Security (DSS) last year. In the video, the director of Radio Biafra was heard talking about the struggle for the Indigenous People of Biafra (IPOB) and why they would not surrender in their struggle. The video obtained by Igberetvnews also had the pro-Biafra leader say: "It is either we have the flag of Biafra raised up or I am lowered into the grave,"

item.title: Chief Of Army Staff Speaks On When Boko Haram Will Be Defeated In Nigeria
item.description: Nigeria’s Chief of Army Staff, Lt. Gen. Ibrahim Attahiru has given fresh assurances that the Boko Haram Terrorist group will soon be defeated in Nigeria. The Army Chief made the promise on Sunday when he visited the troops of Sector 2 Operation Lafiya Dole of the Nigerian Army in Damaturu, Yobe State. He assured the troops that they will get all the backing and support needed to push back the terrorists and end their oppressive reign.

item.title: Chloe Alison - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Instagrammer with over 10,000 followers on the platform. She initially gained a following on Vine where she was known as Cash Money Chloe and she also posted covers of hit songs to her popular SoundCloud channel. She had earned more than 200,000 followers on Vine when the app was shut down.  Before Fame She posted her first video to Vine in July of 2013, but didn't start posting regularly until September of that year.

item.title: Emir Of Askiria Narrates How He Escaped Being Kidnapped By Boko Haram Insurgents
item.description: The Emir of Askiria, Alhaji Abdullahi Muhammadu, has narrated how he escaped from being abducted by members of the Boko Haram sect. The emir, who is a member of the ongoing national conference, said this in a text message to the Deputy Chairman of the conference, Prof. Bolaji Akinyemi on Friday, 30 May, 2014. Earlier today, it was reported that some hoodlums, suspected to be members of the Islamist militants group, invaded the convoy of dignitaries going for the funeral of the late Emir of Gombe, Alhaji Shehu Abubakar and made attempt to abduct some of the Emirs in the entourage.

item.title: Goldie Hawn and Kurt Russell Met All the Way Back in the '60s
item.description: Goldie Hawn and Kurt Russell initially met on the set of a Disney movie in the '60s. Here's everything you need to know about their relationship timeline. Source: Getty ImagesFor the most part, celebrities aren't known for their enduring relationships. Time and time again, we’ve watched our favorite A-list couple crumble, leaving us to take sides in the breakup. But not all Hollywood couples are doomed in the dating department. Take Goldie Hawn and Kurt Russell.

item.title: Only Nave, Visionless Politicians Will Dump PDP For APC
item.description: Former Vice President Atiku Abubakar has berated politicians that dumped the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) for the All Progressives Congress (APC). He also urged the main opposition party to remain united to secure electoral victories in 2023 general elections. Atiku made this known while speaking at a political event organised at Afikpo South LGA in Ebonyi South Senatorial zone by Engr. Dr. Onuoha Nnachi. PDP leaders and stakeholders who attended the event includes; the South-east zonal caretaker Chairman, Chief Ali Odefa; the Senator representing Ebonyi South, Sen.

item.title: Brian Quinn (Comedian) - Age, Family, Bio
CBN Devalues Naira - Legit.ng
item.description: The Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) has today, November 25, announced the devaluation of the naira, with the new exchange officially at N168 to a dollar, and no longer N155. The CBN officials explained that the move to lower the value of the naira against the dollar was aimed at strengthening the currency in the course of the dwindling oil price. CBN governor Godwin Emefiele also urged the government to speed up the process towards the immediate passage of the Petroleum Industry Bill (PIB) pending passage for the past two years.

item.title: Jagadish Chandra Bose - Trivia, Family, Bio
item.description: A Bengali scientist who was a pioneer in the study of radio and microwave optics. He was also a popular science fiction writer and wrote several science books as well. Before Fame He wanted to leave for England to compete for the Indian Civil Service, but his father was adamant about him becoming a scholar. Trivia He wrote Niruddesher Kahini in 1898, which was considered the first major work of Bengali science fiction.

item.title: Police, Army Foil Bandits Attack In Katsina
item.description: The Katsina State Command of the Nigeria Police Force, in collaboration with the military, have successfully foiled a bandit attack. During the operation, the security operatives rescued ten individuals who had been kidnapped along the Kukar Babangida and Yan Gayya Feeder Road in the state, Naija News understands. The incident occurred on Sunday, February 25th, 2024, at approximately 10:40 hours, when a combined patrol team was ambushed by a group of armed bandits wielding AK-47 rifles while conducting a routine patrol along the feeder road.

item.title: Somali women suffer for wanting independence
item.description: - TUKO.co.ke spoke to five Somali women on what it meant to be a woman according to their culture and what consequences are faced should they go against tradition - Issues of stigmatization, eloping, and prostitution came into play as the women explained how they opted to 'rebel' against the norm for their own interests As northern Kenya continues to grow vibrant with more communities heading to the region for business and employment opportunities, so has the lives of Somali women changed as new ideals, cultures and faith are introduced to various northern Kenya counties.

item.title: Yul Edochie Advises Broke Men Having 'Feelings' For Rich Women
item.description: Nollywood actor, Yul Edochie, has opined that not all women are after money and advises ‘broke’ men to keep their confidence level high. Naija News reports that the thespian made this known in a post via Instagram, stating that some women are moved by the quality of a man and his level of reasoning. According to Yul, if a broke man has feelings for a woman, he should not be afraid to confess it as the woman will either say yes or no and would not kill him.

item.title: Aries | Famous Birthdays
item.description: Known as the "house of self" and the "sign of the self" due to being the first sign of the Zodiac. The symbol for Aries is a ram, which is based on Chrysomallus, the winged ram that rescued Phrixus and Helle in Greek mythology. The March equinox marks the point when Aries season begins.  Trivia Aries originates from the Aries constellation, which is located between Pisces (to the west) and Taurus (to the east).

item.title: Jey Uso - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Tag team specialist who wrestled for the WWE as one half of the twin brother duo, The Usos. They are the first team to be Undisputed WWE Tag Team Champions after simultaneously holding the RAW and SmackDown titles.  Before Fame He made his professional debut in World Xtreme Wrestling in 2007. Trivia He and his brother were Tag Team Champions, while competing for Florida Championship Wrestling. Family Life He is the twin brother of Jimmy Uso and his brother Solo Sikoa are also wrestlers.

item.title: LASU Students Take Over Governor Fasholas Office
item.description: Lagos State University (LASU) students who are protesting against the hike in school fees from N25,000 to N350,000 and the arrest of some of their colleagues have literally taken over the office of governor of the state, Babatunde Fashola. Mrs Ijeoma Okwor, the coordinator of Human Rights Agenda Network (HRAN), an NGO, on Thursday in a statement in Abuja condemned the police attack on students of the university while calling on the Lagos State Government to reverse what is called the “arbitrary increase” in the school fees in the interest of peace in the state.

item.title: Sanwo-Olu Imposes Total Ban On Okada In Six Local Councils [Full List]
item.description: The Lagos State Government has banned the operation of commercial motorcycles popularly called Okada, in six Local Government Areas of the state. Naija News reports that Governor Babajide Sanwo-Olu made the announcement while briefing heads of security agencies in the state at a meeting at the State House, Ikeja on Wednesday. The governor stated that the total ban on Okada in the six local councils takes effect from June 1, 2022, and would be fully enforced.

item.title: TikTok Star Chris Rooney Has Been Found After He Briefly Seemed to Go Missing
item.description: On Aug. 3, 2023, it was announced that TikTok star Chris Rooney had been found after going missing for nine days. What happened to him? Source: Instagram/@theyeetbabyThe gist: TikTok star Chris Rooney was found safe on Aug. 3 after going missing for nine days.It's unclear what exactly happened to the TikToker, who has more than 5 million followers and often featured his young niece, Marleigh, in his videos.Chris recently revealed that he and his wife Emily have separated, and Chris may use this time to step away from the spotlight a bit.

item.title: Adam Sandler's Wife Is the Reason He's Made Such Interesting Career Moves

It's the film where the two met, in fact. In the scene, Jackie — playing a waitress in a bar — goes up to little Julian (played by the Sprouse twins) to see what he's doing there alone at a table.

item.title: Customer Saw Boston Market Get Health Inspection Violations

A Boston Market customer claimed that a health inspector was on hand to pass out violations during their meal at the chain restaurant. And of course, this tummy turning event was shared to social media. Using the TikTok handle @toxic_fartz, the creator posted a very short clip that shared more than enough information with followers so they could easily conclude that a Boston Market meal might be worth skipping next time.

item.title: Russia Destroys Worlds Largest Plane In Ukraine
item.description: The Antonov AN-225, the world’s largest aircraft has been destroyed during Russia’s invasion of its neighbouring country, Ukraine. CNN disclosed that the aircraft which was called “Mriya” and parked at an airfield near Kyiv was destroyed by Russian forces during an attack. Ukrainian authorities while speaking on the development stated that it would rebuild the plane and continue to defend the country. Ukrainian Foreign Minister, Dmytro Kuleba in a post on Twitter wrote: “Russia May have destroyed our ‘Mriya’ but they will never be able to destroy our dream of a strong, free and democratic European State.

item.title: January 1 Horoscope and Zodiac
item.description: Saturn is the planetary ruler of the Capricorn, but as you were born in the second Decan, or part, of the sign, you also receive a generous helping of Venus's planetary power. Being the planet of control, Saturn's influence is reflected in your determined and disciplined qualities. Venus's influence is more heavily tied to harmony and is linked to your appreciation of beauty and social qualities. Your unique combination of planetary influences makes you far more social, creative and adaptable than the other Capricorn Decans.

item.title: Top Boko Haram Commander Surrenders To Troops In Borno
item.description: A top commander of the dreaded Boko Haram terrorist group, Goni Farooq, has reportedly relinquished himself to troops of the Nigerian Army. Naija News reports that the development was confirmed on Sunday by counterterrorism expert and crime reports analyst [@mobilisingniger]. The security expert said the Boko Haram fighter surrendered and gave up his firearms to troops manned at Banki in Borno State. He said the latest victory was unconnected with the recent onslaught in the Bama town in Borno by gallant officers of Operation Hadin Kai.

item.title: Xolo Mariduea - Idade, Vida Pessoal, Biografia
item.description: Sobre Ator que ficou famoso ao interpretar Victor Graham na série Parenthood de 2012 a 2014. Ele também participou de Crimes Graves em 2013. Em 2018, passou a estrelar a série Cobra Kai. Antes da Fama Começou a atuar profissionalmente aos 10 anos e logo foi escolhido para estrelar comerciais de televisão. Curiosidades Contracenou com Jeff Garlin na comédia Dealin' with Idiots, de 2013. Vida Pessoal Nasceu em Los Angeles em uma família de origem cubana, equatoriana e mexicana.

item.title: Giratina Origin Forme Is Available in 'Pokmon GO' Does It Come in Shiny?
item.description: Can Giratina be shiny in its Origin Forme? The legendary Pokémon is currently available in 'Pokémon GO' raid battles. Can you get a shiny version? Source: Twitter/Krishianime2Whether you're a real completionist as a Pokémon trainer or are just looking for bragging rights among your fellow players, you might be on the lookout for Shiny versions of your favorite Pokémon. In case you aren't aware, Shiny Pokémon are Pokémon with an alternate color scheme than their usual palette.

item.title: Im Gonna Leak It - Olamide Dares Fireboy On Twitter
item.description: Nigerian musician, Olamide Gbenga Adedeji, popularly known as Olamide, has caused stirs on Twitter after threatening to release Fireboy’s 3rd studio album. According to the hip hop star, Fireboy’s 3rd album has been with him since October last year and the youngster has refused to make move for its release. Olamide who seems to be desperate to release the album told his followers to reach out to Fireboy else he will release it.

item.title: Rich man buried in a lion-like coffin in Enugu (photos)
item.description: Wonders shall never end! Nigerians are creative no doubt and their creativity is now being extended to how their late family members are being buried. According to a Facebook user, a rich man was buried with a lion like casket in Enugu state. According to the eyewitness who shared photos from the burial on Facebook, he claimed that the late man was his good friend and that he could not believe his eyes when he saw the casket the man would be buried in.

item.title: See Latest Results From Polling Units As APC Opens Up Lead
item.description: Voting has ended in the 2022 governorship election in Ekiti State conducted by the Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC). As voting has ended, counting and sorting of ballots is ongoing in earnest at the various polling units for onward transmission and collation of results. The election is to choose the next Governor of the state upon the expiration of the tenure of the incumbent, Kayode Fayemi, Naija News reports. Below is the full list of all candidates that participated in the election and their parties.

item.title: Supreme Court Takes Action On Shettima's Double Nomination
item.description: The supreme court has dismissed the suit seeking the disqualification of Bola Tinubu and Kashim Shettima as presidential and vice-presidential candidates of the All Progressives Congress (APC). Recall, the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) filed a case against Shettima, alleging double nomination of the party’s Vice Presidential candidate, Senator Kashim Shettima. The PDP had claimed that Shettima’s nomination as Tinubu’s running mate was in breach of the provisions of sections 29(1), 33, 35, and 84(1)(2) of the Electoral Act, 2022.

item.title: 'Among Us' What to Know About the Popular Video Game
item.description: Throughout the COVID-19 lockdown, various video games rose to popularity, bringing more people to gaming than ever before thanks to the abundance of time players had on their hands. While many video game consoles saw an increase in sales, mobile games like Among Us also saw their biggest heyday. Among Us is an online multiplayer game where every member plays as a crewmate aboard the same ship. At least one of the players is an imposter set on taking down the ship and everyone in it.

item.description: Did Snooki and Jionni break up? The 'Jersey Shore' star's husband recently shared a cryptic post on social media that has fans worried. On August 7, Jionni Lavelle — the husband of Nicole "Snooki" Polizzi — took to social media to share a cryptic post that left fans worried the two split. The Instagram story, which is no longer available to view, featured a black screen with the message, "

item.title: 25 Movies You Should Watch to Really Understand Gen Xers
item.description: Gen X gets lost in the war between boomers and millennials, but it's a complex and fascinating group of people. You can tell from the movies that defined the generation. Source: Universal PicturesPoor Gen X. The post-boomer generation of people born between the mid-1960s and 1980 face a lot of erasure due to the obsession with millennials and how we're killing every industry. But Gen Xers faced the world with a unique set of traits and values that, if you pay close attention, are extremely evident in the movies that define the era, along with the perfect fashion choices of the '80s and '90s.

item.title: Alanna Arrington - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Victoria's Secret model who has also modeled for brands like American Apparel and Louis Vuitton. She graced the cover of the June 2016 issue of Wonderland Magazine. Before Fame She played basketball at her high school in Cedar Rapids, Iowa. Trivia She walked in the Victoria's Secret Fashion Show in 2016 and 2017. Family Life She posted a photo with her younger sister to her Instagram account on her sister's graduation from middle school in June 2015.

item.title: Anerlisa Muigai leaves singer Akothee thirsty with figure-hugging dress and it is super funny
item.description: It is not everyday you see one Kenyan celebrity thirsting on another one but on Sunday, December 9, flamboyant singer and businesslady Akothee simply could not resist. The mother of five was left stunned by one of the Keroche Breweries heiress’ latest social media photos which was in many ways lust-inducing. Anerlisa and Akothee have pretty much similar struggles, particular online so it comes as no surprise that they always find themselves in each other’s timelines complementing and motivating one another.

item.title: Celebs Who Are Low-Key Rumoured to Be Involved in the Occult
item.description: From Azealia Banks to Marilyn Manson, these celebrities have been rumored to dabble in the occult or witchcraft. Source: Getty ImagesIt make sense that Hollywood would be an unholy haven for members of the occult. You'd have to be involved in the Black Arts to get that star on the Walk of Fame, amirite? But while fame definitely has a dark side, some evil little tidbits seem highly exaggerated. Stevie Nicks plays a witch on American Horror Story, but has shrugged off those rumors like a gold shawl.

item.title: Cement is too Expensive: Nigerian Man who Built House with Plastic Bottles Finally Speaks in Viral V
item.description: - A Nigerian man, Ahmed Yahaya, said he built a house made with plastic bottles as a way to reduce waste dumps - The builder also revealed that the structure gives cool temperature as plastics are very bad conductors of heat - To source materials, the man had to go to places like eateries where plastics are mostly used PAY ATTENTION: Legit.ng is on a mission to support vulnerable children of Calabar – join the initiative on Patreon, let’s change more lives together!

item.title: Dayo Amusa launches web-site, unveils a new set of sultry pics.
item.description: The Yoruba movie actress Dayo Amusa has just launched her personal website, where one can find a set of sultry and super-feminine promo photos of her. The actress also intends to use the site for promoting her new movie ‘Unforgivable’ starring Desmond Elliot and Mike Ezuruonye. The premier of the film is set for November 2013, so we are going to see more of Dayo Amusa this year! Check out the photos below.

item.title: Details Of Al-Makura's Meeting With Akeredolu Emerge
item.description: Former Governor of Nasarawa State, Senator Tanko Al-Makura has met with Governor Rotimi Akeredolu of Ondo State over the national chairmanship position of the ruling All Progressives Congress. Al-Makura, who is one of the top leading aspirants for the chairmanship position, met with Akeredolu in continuation of consultations with party stakeholders at the weekend in Akure, the Ondo capital. Al-Makura said he decided to visit Ondo to inform Governor Akeredolu of his aspiration to become the next party national chairman because he is one of the leaders in the country.

item.title: Did Bob Barker Have Any Kids? Inside the Late Game Show Host's Personal Life
item.description: Former host of 'The Price Is Right' Bob Barker passed away at age 99, leaving behind longtime companion Nancy Burnet. Did he leave kids behind, too? Source: Getty ImagesLegendary game show host Bob Barker has sadly passed away at age 99 of natural causes on August 26, 2023. He leaves behind millions of mourning celebrities, fans, and longtime girlfriend Nancy Burnet. Now the question is, did he leave behind any children — either with Nancy or wife, Dorothy Jo Gideon?

item.title: Drew Sidora's Husband Is a Rockstar Father and Step-Dad to Their Kids
item.description: The actress is known for her roles in 'That's So Raven' and 'Step Up,' but plenty of fans have likely wondered: Who is Drew Sidora's husband? Source: Getty ImagesActress and singer Drew Sidora is best known for playing Lucy Avila in the movie Step Up, along with her recurring role as Chantel in the Disney TV series That's So Raven. Although she has had steady acting gigs since then, plenty of fans have likely been wondering what Drew has been up to in her personal life since then.

item.title: Full List Of 27 States That Recorded Zero Foreign Investments In Nine Months
item.description: A recent report by the National Bureau of Statistics (NBS) revealed that a total of 27 states in Nigeria failed to attract any foreign investments for the first nine months of 2023. Naija News understands that the statistics represent a slight decrease from the 28 states that recorded zero foreign investments in the first half of the year. Below is a list of the 27 states that attracted no foreign investments in the first nine months of 2023:

item.title: Gender Rights Activist Hits Oil Producing State Governors For Not Tackling Menace Of Out-of-School C
item.description: Governments of the six oil-bearing states of Akwa Ibom, Bayelsa, Cross River, Delta, Edo, and Rivers, have come under severe criticism for allegedly failing to tackle the menace of out-of-school children in the geopolitical zone. Gender rights activist, Dorathy Ene Eyo, on Saturday, told Naija News that many children in the oil and gas region are currently growing up the hard way. According to her, ‘’in Akwa Ibom, Bayelsa, Delta, Rivers and other states in the larger Niger Delta area, there are tens of thousands of children living in squalor and poverty.

item.title: Jackie Jackson - Age, Family, Bio
Jenny Jones (TV Show Host) - Age, Family, Bio
Jos Daccarett - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Best recognized as the father of Disney's Descendants star Sofia Carson. Before Fame Originally from Colombia, he moved to the United States in his youth and later met his wife in Florida. Trivia He studied at Florida Atlantic University. Family Life His wife, Laura Char Carson, is related to the Char family, a line of Colombian politicians. In addition to Sofia, they have another daughter named Paulina. Associated With His daughter starred opposite Dove Cameron in the made-for-TV movie Descendants.

item.title: Julie Adams - Trivia, Family, Bio
item.description: Actress who appeared in the classic film The Creature of the Black Lagoon. Before Fame She had a brief role on the TV show Murder, She Wrote. Trivia She worked as a secretary before becoming famous, and played a secretary in the 2011 film Carnage. Family Life She has two children and married twice; her last marriage was to Ray Danton from 1954 until 1981.  Associated With She was in the film Tickle Me with Elvis Presley.

item.title: Justine Bateman - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Appeared as Mallory Keaton on the television show Family Ties with Michael J. Fox and appeared in the 1988 film Satisfaction. Before Fame She became interested in acting after watching her brother, Jason Bateman, star in Little House on the Prairie, and went on to sign with his agency. Trivia She has been a writer, actress, and producer and ran the production company SECTION 5. Family Life She married Mark Fluent in 2001, and the couple had a son and daughter together.

item.title: Miki Hamano - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Actress and model picked up by Scout Model Agency San Francisco and Wilhelmina Models Los Angeles. In 2018, she made her motion picture debut in Perfect. Before Fame A day after beginning collegiate experience in the United States, a classmate of hers asked her to model for a project. This was the inception for her modeling career. Trivia Her modeling experience and Los Angeles lifestyle would be displayed on her misshamino Instagram for more than 220,000 followers.

item.title: Murang'a: Shangwe Kijijini Mtoto Aliyetoweka Miaka 27 Iliyopita Kurejea Nyumbani
item.description: Hannah Wangari aliondoka kwao mwaka 1994 kuenda kutafuta kazi Limuru na tangu wakati huo alitengana na familia yakeMama huyo wa watoto watano ambaye sasa ana umri wa miaka 42, alirejea nyumbani kwao Murang'a baada ya miaka 27 na kushtua familia yakeMnamo 2006, familia yake ilizika mwili wa mwanamke mwingine ikidhania ni wa jamaa waoHabari Nyingine: Gavana wa Baringo Stanly Kiptis Atimuliwa na Bumba la Nyuki Kwenye Hafla ya Hadhara Familia moja kutoka Kiharu, kaunti ya Murang'a inasherehekea baada ya binti yao aliyeondoka nyumbani mwaka 1994, na ambaye walidhania alifariki mwaka 2006, kurejea nyumbani.

item.title: Ondo Deputy Gov Continues As Acting Gov As Akeredolu Extends Medical Leave
item.description: Ondo State Governor, Rotimi Akeredolu, has reached out to the state House of Assembly to extend his medical leave. In his letter, he noted that his request was based on doctors’ advice, suggesting he needed more rest after his recovery. The Speaker of the Assembly, Rt Hon Olamide Oladiji, confirmed the receipt of the letter in Akure, the state capital. Oladiji applauded Akeredolu for adhering to the Constitution of the Federal Republic of Nigeria, particularly section 190, expressing gratitude for his speedy recovery and expressing hope for his swift return.

item.title: The Best TV Presidents of All Time, From 'Veep' to 'House of Cards'
item.description: Here Are the Best TV Presidents of All Time, From 'Veep' to 'House of Cards'By Katie GarrityUpdated Feb. 12 2020, 6:46 p.m. ET Source: NetflixThe fascinating thing about TV presidents is that, typically, they do not reflect what the people really look for when it comes to the leader of the free world. Some TV presidents are idiotic, some are corrupt, and some are in office for reasons that were totally out of their control.

item.title: The Igbos Were Against Obasanjo Presidency, But It Is Time For Them To Rule
item.description: An Afenifere chieftain, Chief Olu Falae has said that the next president of Nigeria should be of Igbo descent. Falae said that he would be supporting the Labour Party (LP) presidential candidate, Peter Obi, in the upcoming 2023 election. He, however, stated that he was unaware of the position of the Afenifere on the LP presidential candidate. The former Minister of Finance said that though he supports Igbo presidency, the Yoruba are not morally obliged to do the same.

item.title: This Person Found the Most Creative Way to Return a Lost Wallet
item.description: When Tim lost his wallet on the way home from work, he thought it was a lost cause since he didn't have a lot of identifying info in there. But a good Samaritan found a creative way to get in touch. Source: iStock Photo / TwitterHave you ever lost your wallet in a public place? The feeling of your heart dropping in your chest is like no other. It's the worst feeling in the world.

item.title: Trevi Moran - Age, Family, Bio
Woman in Viral 'Lose Your Job' Video Says it Changed Her Life
item.description: Woman in Viral 'Lose Yo Job' Video Says It Changed Her Life for the BetterBy Robin ZlotnickUpdated June 9 2020, 12:59 p.m. ET Source: Twitter / InstagramIn early 2020, Johnniqua Charles, a 27-year-old woman from Dillon, SC, was detained by a security officer for reasons unbeknownst to her. She was videotaped asking the security guard why she is being detained and then singing and dancing about how he was about to lose his job.
